content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]

Experience magical moments of Japanese afternoon tea ceremony. 

 

Indulge in the art déco atmosphere of the Esplanade Bar or the iconic Oleander Terrace and taste a selection of fine small snacks full of nutrients that contain no lactose, gluten, foods of animal origin or refined sugars*. An enticing selection of handmade healthy snacks and desserts is prepared from carefully selected ingredients and served on tea stand with one of the healthiest drinks in the world – matcha. 
 

 

Matcha is a finely ground powder made in Japan from young green tea leaves, and is recognised around the world for its benefits and beneficial effects on the body. Matcha by Materia is known for its premium quality, lush green colour and a special umami taste. It contains natural caffeine that is gradually released throughout the day, providing more stable and long-lasting energy. It is rich in antioxidants, vitamins and minerals, it enhances focus and concentration, speeds up metabolism, protects the heart and rejuvenates both inside and out. Although known since ancient times, matcha is a perfect drink of the new age. 

 

The Esplanade’s Matcha afternoon tea by Materia includes a collection of small snacks and desserts served on a tiered tray, with a select matcha beverage such as matcha tea, cappuccino, or ice latte with the addition of almond, coconut or soy milk, vanilla extract and natural birch sugar, maple syrup, or honey. The offer is intended for two people and amounts to HRK 395 (52,43 €*). Matcha afternoon tea is served at the Esplanade Bar and on the Oleander Terrace until autumn.

 

You can book a table by phone at: 01/45 666 33.
  • Check the Menu
*Prices in EUR (€*) are for informational purposes only. The official fixed exchange rate applies for conversion (EUR 1 = HRK 7.53450).

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_separator][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
